snippet: The body’s paralysis over Syria has marked a new level of dysfunction, experts say, and has bolstered the arguments of those who call for a fundamental shake-up of its composition.
abstract: Diplomatic Memo; Security Council has not just failed to halt the civil war in Syria, but has also been unable to deliver humanitarian supplies like food and medicine to millions of Syrians in need; experts say lack of action marks new level of dysfunction, and has bolstered arguments of those who call for a fundamental shake-up of the Council's composition and rules of engagement.
lead_paragraph: The body’s paralysis over Syria has marked a new level of dysfunction, experts say, and has bolstered the arguments of those who call for a fundamental shake-up of its composition.

headline.main: In Dealings on Syria, Security Council Exposes Its Failings
headline.print_headline: In Dealings on Syria, Security Council Exposes Its Failings
